contentrichtext.text: '''David Megginson''' (born 1964) is a [[Canada|Canadian]] computer [[software]] consultant and developer, specializing in [[open source software development]] and application. He was the lead developer and original maintainer of the [[Simple API for XML]], or SAX, a leading streaming [[application programming interface|API]] for [[XML]]. Megginson has been part of the [[SGML]] and then [[XML]] communities since 1991. For the [[World Wide Web Consortium]], he served as chair of the XML Information Set Working Group and as a member of both the XML Working Group and XML Co-ordination Group. In 2000, [[Sun Microsystems]] and [[JavaPro]] magazine awarded Megginson the Java Technology Achievement Award For Outstanding Individual Contribution to the Java Community . He made significant contributions to other [[open source]] software projects including [[FlightGear]], a [[cross-platform]] [[flight simulator]] making use of XML, the NewsML Toolkit library for [[NewsML]], the XMLWriter libraries for [[Perl]] and [[Java (programming language)|Java]], RDF Filter, and SGMLSpm, a mid-1990s precursor to many XML functionalities. He is an [[instrument rating|instrument-rated]] private pilot, and maintains [[weblog]]s about technology and small-plane [[aviation]]. Formerly employed by the [[University of Ottawa]], he maintains his consulting and development practice in [[Ottawa]], [[Ontario]]. ==Publications== * {{cite book | title = Structuring XML Documents | publisher = [[Pearson PLC|Prentice Hall]] | year = 1998 | isbn = 0-13-642299-3 }} An advanced guide focusing on XML and SGML [[document type definition]]s. * {{cite book | title = Imperfect XML: Rants, Raves, Tips, and Tricks ... from an Insider | publisher = [[Addison-Wesley]] Professional | year = 2004 | isbn = 0-13-145349-1 }} A broad exploration of XML applications and standards. ==External links== *[http://www.megginson.com/ megginson.com] *[http://www.megginson.com/blogs/quoderat/ Quoderat, Megginson's technology weblog] *[http://www.megginson.com/blogs/lahso/ Land and Hold Short, Megginson's aviation weblog] {{Authority control|VIAF=102118739}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Megginson, David | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1964 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Megginson, David}} [[Category:1964 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Canadian computer scientists]] [[Category:Computer programmers]] [[Category:University of Toronto alumni]] [[Category:XML Guild]] {{Canada-compu-bio-stub}}
